Một vài lệnh linux trên centos7

Jun 3, 2022

Tim thu muc khi biet ten file

find / -name find / -name deploy.sh

Remove all images

docker images | grep ‘' | awk '{print $3}' | xargs docker image rm -f {}

Nginx port denied

If you use a port bigger than 1024 with root privilege, but still got this problem, that’s may be caused by SELinux:

Check this port, say 8024, in segange port

Show

sudo semanage port -l | grep http_port_t

If 8024 doesn’t exist in the port list, add it into segange port

Add

sudo semanage port -a -t http_port_t -p tcp 8024

Extract

tar -xzvf node_exporter-1.3.1.linux-amd64.tar.gz

Chọn fish làm default shell

chsh -s $(which fish)

list file by date

ls -lt

update package

Centos 7

yum -y update

install wget

Centos 7

yum install wget

install net-tools

Centos 7

yum install net-tools

yum install psmisc
